Font of Despair.name: Font of Despair
Font of Despair.flavor: You raise your weapon above your head and pronounce doom upon nearby foes.
Font of Despair.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Font of Despair.effect: You can either make a saving throw, with a power bonus equal to the number of enemies you hit with this attack, or gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn. The resistance equals your Strength modifier.

Dark Burden.name: Dark Burden
Dark Burden.flavor: As an enemy crumples beneath your devastating attack, the evil within escapes to torment all around you.
Dark Burden.effect: Each creature adjacent to you other than the target takes ongoing 10 necrotic and psychic damage (save ends). At the start of each of your turns, you can slide each creature taking this ongoing damage up to a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Unholy Aura.name: Unholy Aura
Unholy Aura.flavor: You whisper a prayer asking for protection. The evil within grows until none can bear to linger in your presence.
Unholy Aura.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the aura, you can push that creature 1 square as an opportunity action.
